description: Episode of Series "This is the United Nations". Cinemagazine items: 1. London centre checks influenza - By swift recognition of the type and strain of virus causing influenza, the World Health Organisation centre at London helps to check epidemics. 2. UN laboratory aids fight on opium smuggling - In New York the UN narcotic Division has set up a laboratory which identifies the source of any opium seized, thus assisting authorities to trace smugglers.
